title: Citi Dominican Republic Introduces Risk Management Products
summary: Santiago, Dominican Republic – On July 18, Citi Dominican Republic hosted a breakfast, led by Country Treasurer Javier Guerrero, for its clients in the northern region.
tag-1: Citi Dominican Republic Introduces Risk Management Products
tag-3: Santiago, Dominican Republic – On July 18, Citi Dominican Republic hosted a breakfast, led by Country Treasurer Javier Guerrero, for its clients in the northern region.
tag-4: During the event, Raul Hoyo, Vice President, Citi Derivatives Products, talked about the different risk management and mitigation products available for companies in the Dominican market. Additionally, Ivonne Perez, Senior Manager - Currency Management, introduced Citi FX Pulse, a global web platform specifically designed to exchange currencies online at no additional cost to Citi's clients.
tag-5: "Today, a growing number of big companies must procure coverage against the market's volatility, even in Latin America. According to Brown, Bartman and Fehle, 69 percent of the corporations in the region utilize risk-coverage to maximize their financial performance. One of Citi's key principles is responsible finance, so we are constantly hosting events like this to share important global trends with our clients and our world-class products and services," said Javier Guerrero.
tag-6: The event brought together presidents, CEOs and CFOs from top companies in the northern region. It was hosted at the Salon Marien in the Hodelpa Gran Almirante Hotel. After the presentation, the audience had the opportunity to share opinions about these and other topics with Citi's executives.
tag-7: Citi Citi, the leading global financial services company, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management. Additional information may be found at www.citigroup.com.
